description: A method for importing external data automatically (esp., from FOSS Android apps like Medilog or Gadgetbridge) without having to rely google (or any other big Tech company).
summary: Great idea but not at all practical

description: It's so easy to use as all GNOME apps.
Great application, syncs wonderfully with Google Fitness. Especially useful now Google has shut down their website for Fitness for some bizarre reason.
summary: Great application, works well with Google Fitness

description: Tres simple suivi de poids et de marche qui peut se connecter à google fit
